title: Cotic is Selling the Tailfin Sea Otter FlareMAX
content:
Remember that sweet one-off Custom Cotic x Tailfin FlareMAX from our Sea Otter Reportage that was decked out with all the Tailfin gear? Well, Cotic is selling it as a complete at a discounted price of £6499…

It is a FlareMAX Gen5 C3 size frame, with custom gas tank bag mounts on the top tube, and an à la Carte custom three-color ombré fade paint finish. It comes complete with the Tailfin custom-fit framebag and the Tailfin rear axle so you can mount a rear rack like the show bike. This is a full-house Platinum build with XTR.

The condition is almost showroom. It’s never been ridden. The frame is completely unmarked.

Build Spec:

  • Cotic FlareMAX frame – C3 Size – White/Ember/Gritstone 3 Colour A La Carte Fade
  • Custom gas tank bosses on the top tube
  • Custom Tailfin framebag
  • Rockshox SID Ultimate 120mm fork
  • Cane Creek Air IL Shock – 125mm travel
  • Hope Fortus26 wheels
  • Shimano XTR Drivetrain
  • Hope EVO Cranks, XCR E4 brakes, Headset, BB
  • SDG Tellis V2 170mm dropper post, WTB Volt Ti Saddle
  • WTB Macro 2.4″ tyres
  • Hope TR Stem and Carbon 20mm rise bar

The full gallery can be seen here on Flickr

Cotic can accept Cycle to Work on this bike, and can also offer 24 months 0% finance with just a 20% deposit.

Check it out at Cotic Bikes.
